response.original_title: The Metropolitan Opera: The Magic Flute
response.overview: Julie Taymor’s dazzling production returns to select cinemas this holiday season in an encore presentation of the company's first-ever Live in HD transmission. James Levine conducts a winning ensemble including Matthew Polenzani, Nathan Gunn, and René Pape in this abridged, English-language version of Mozart’s classic fable.
response.tagline: James Levine conducts a winning ensemble including Matthew Polenzani, Nathan Gunn, and René Pape in this abridged, English-language version of Mozart’s classic fable.
response.title: The Metropolitan Opera: The Magic Flute
